questions.question: How old are you?
questions.questionRelevance: This helps to understand how strong your hair scalp will be. The older you are, the stronger your scalp and vice versa.

questions.question: Time Schedule?
questions.questionRelevance: This helps us understand how busy or free you are so we can recommend a regimen that works for your time.
